Oak_Lawn.Chicago Ridge Mall: Chicago Ridge Mall, formerly Westfield Chicago Ridge from 2004-2012, is a shopping mall in Chicago Ridge, Illinois. The mall includes three anchor stores (Carson's, Kohl's, and Sears), as well as a Bed Bath & Beyond, Michaels arts and crafts store, a movie theater and a food court. It was built in 1981 and expanded in 1986.
